Work With Me

To raise new questions, new possibilities, to regard old problems from a new angle, requires creative imagination and marks real advance in science.

hey, I'm sam!

Hey, I’m Sam. I’m a New York based travel, fashion and lifestyle influencer. My professional experience includes working at several large advertising agencies across a variety of accounts including Carnival Cruise Corp, Discover Card, Toyota and Revlon. I recently had an affair with entrepreneurship which allowed me to become a trusted voice in the travel, tech and finance communities in NYC.

These experiences have enabled me to become an effective marketing partner for brands today. My skills include: photography, writing, campaign creation and social media marketing. I love working with brands to create data-driven strategies that accomplish traffic and conversion goals.
